title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate Today – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
January 10, 2018
Holly W. Greaves, of the District of Columbia, to be Chief Financial Officer, Environmental Protection Agency, vice Barbara J. Bennett, resigned.Paul C. Ney, Jr., of Tennessee, to be General Counsel of the Department of Defense, vice Jennifer M. O’Connor.
